The DigitalContent.com (DCNT) Token Sale is LIVE! #ICO #tokensale #digitalcontent https://digitalcontent.com
JOSIC MEDIA is a leading provider of news and insights on Digital Trends.

DigitalContent.com is an easy to use content marketing platform which enables you to automate your content strategy, creation and distribution process. Build your content schedule and sit back as a network of experts create, review and publish your content. Rinse, repeat.

Daily Deal Media is the nation's leading provider of news, data and intelligence for Social Commerce and the Daily Deal Industry. Daily Deal Media tracks and rates publishers and merchants using key performance indicators such as daily sales, product offerings, performance metrics and deal history which allows us to provide our clients with valuable deal data and business intelligence.

summary: Boyan is an entrepreneur, investor and product visionary for digital media related products and services. He is the Founder & CEO of JOSIC Media and DigitalContent.com.Boyan is also the founder and host of the Content Marketing Summit, an annual event which covers digital strategy and content marketing. Previously Boyan was the Founder of DailyDealMedia, a leading trade publication which covered the explosive rise of daily deal publishers like Groupon and LivingSocial.
